Method Detail

add

public void add(Document document,
                ResourceType documentType,
                java.lang.String extension,
                java.lang.String navigationTitle,
                boolean visibleInNav,
                java.util.Map parameters)
         throws DocumentBuildException,
                PublicationException
The instance of Document will be built by the implementation of DocumentBuilder; the physical representation will be built by the implementation of NodeCreatorInterface, where the implementation to be used is specified in doctypes.xconf (and thus depends on the publication and the resource type to be used)

Specified by:
add in interface DocumentManager
Parameters:
document - The document to add.
documentType - the document type (aka resource type) of the new document
extension - The extension to use for the document source.
navigationTitle - navigation title
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation
parameters - any parameters the caller needs to pass to the creator
Throws:
PublicationException - if the document is already contained.
DocumentBuildException - if the document can not be created
See Also:
DocumentManager.add(Document, ResourceType, String, String, boolean, Map), NodeCreatorInterface, DocumentBuilder

add

public void add(Document document,
                Document sourceDocument,
                java.lang.String extension,
                java.lang.String navigationTitle,
                boolean visibleInNav,
                java.util.Map parameters)
         throws DocumentBuildException,
                PublicationException
Description copied from interface: DocumentManager
Creates a new document in the same publication the parentDocument belongs to with the given parameters:

Specified by:
add in interface DocumentManager
Parameters:
document - The document to add.
sourceDocument - The document to initialize the contents and meta data from.
extension - The extension to use for the document source.
navigationTitle - navigation title
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation
parameters - any parameters the caller needs to pass to the creator
Throws:
DocumentBuildException - if the document can not be created
PublicationException - if the document is already contained.
See Also:

add

protected void add(Document document,
                   ResourceType documentType,
                   java.lang.String extension,
                   java.lang.String navigationTitle,
                   boolean visibleInNav,
                   java.util.Map parameters,
                   java.lang.String initialContentsURI)
            throws DocumentBuildException,
                   DocumentException,
                   PublicationException
Adds a document.

Parameters:
document - The document.
documentType - The document type.
extension - The extension for the document source.
navigationTitle - The navigation title.
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation
parameters - The parameters for the creator.
initialContentsURI - A URI to read the contents from.
Throws:
DocumentBuildException - if an error occurs.
DocumentException - if an error occurs.
PublicationException - if an error occurs.

copy

public void copy(Document sourceDocument,
                 Document destinationDocument)
          throws PublicationException
Template method to copy a document. Override copyDocumentSource(Document, Document) to implement access to a custom repository.

Specified by:
copy in interface DocumentManager
Parameters:
sourceDocument - The document to copy.
destinationDocument - The destination document.
Throws:
PublicationException - if a document which destinationDocument depends on does not exist.
See Also:

Description copied from interface: DocumentManager
Moves a document to another location, incl. all requiring documents. If a sitetree is used, this means that the whole subtree is moved.
